landing.title-2:
and organize all
 your work in one place
landing.transform-gestion-description: Discover how Gestionate can help you be more productive and efficient in your daily work
landing.service-1-description: Upload your incomes and expenses quickly and easily, and get a summary of your accounts
landing.service-2-description: Monitor the inflow and outflow of products with a clear and intuitive interface to control the status of your sales and stock
landing.service-3-description: We offer a Kanban board so you can view and manage the status of your tasks and projects
landing.service-4-description: You can upload lists of clients, suppliers, employees, or whatever you want and need for your business, company, or institution
landing.service-5-description: You can restrict access to certain sections of the application so that only authorized users can see them
landing.service-6-description: You can choose from several themes and customize the application to your liking so you feel comfortable working
landing.join-gestionate-description: Plans tailored to you, with all the features you need to optimize your workday
landing.plan-basic-description: Contains all the available features. Ideal if you want to start organizing invoicing, customer records, inventory, and team activities in small organizations.
landing.plan-pro-description: Explore expansion opportunities with this plan, allowing you to increase the number of users, dashboards, and workspaces. Ideal for growing organizations.
landing.plan-enterprise-description: This is the ultimate plan. All the features, virtually unlimited, to cover all your organization's requirements, no matter the size.

tabs-description.all-in-one: With Gestionate you can optimize your work by managing all the secondary platforms you need in your daily work life, in one place.
tabs-description.space: With Gestionate, while you'll participate in a shared workspace, you can personalize your experience. You can change fonts, colors and add widgets to your homepage. Create personal notes, shortcuts, integrate your Spotify account and much more.
tabs-description.customization: No matter what type of organization you work for, Gestionate adapts to your needs. Creating tables, records, expense/income categories and more can be customized to fit your organization and preferences.
tabs-description.team: Work in a collaborative environment with your team. You can invite other users to join your organization and assign them specific roles and permissions. Chat with them, create meetings, leave notes, share files and much more.
tabs-description.security: Gestionate's security layer is designed to protect both your data and your work and ensure that only authorized people have access to them.

products.main-features-description-3: Manage projects, files, and operations from one place with tools designed for modern teams.
products.feature-description-1: Manage all team tasks in real time in a simple and efficient way, whether with ordered view in list, calendar or Kanban board.
products.feature-1-item-1-subitem-1: Kanban board, calendar and task list
products.feature-1-item-1-subitem-2: Status, due date, priority and assignees per task
products.feature-1-item-1-subitem-3: Task report downloads in PDF and Excel
products.feature-1-item-4-subitem-2: Tags per task in personal Notes
products.feature-1-item-4-subitem-4: Quick filters by status, priority, due date, assignee
products.feature-description-2: Upload your records, documents and important files securely and access them from anywhere.
products.feature-2-item-1-subitem-1: Create independent tables where you can list your records and save information in each one
products.feature-2-item-1-subitem-2: You can load records manually or upload an Excel file directly
products.feature-2-item-1-subitem-3: All tables are customizable, meaning they are built depending on your data entry
products.feature-2-item-1-subitem-4: Each record is unique and you can upload images, PDF or Excel documents, and more
products.feature-2-item-2-subitem-1: Share the files you need with end-to-end encryption
products.feature-2-item-2-subitem-2: Access to record details with password only for authorized users
products.feature-2-item-2-subitem-3: Activity log and audit to know who accesses and/or modifies each record or data
products.feature-2-item-2-subitem-4: With permission management you can control who accesses each table, and even allow read-only access
products.feature-2-item-3-subitem-2: Search semantically and execute actions with AI
products.feature-2-item-name-4: More about the scope of operations
products.feature-2-item-4-subitem-1: Integration with Google Drive, OneDrive and Dropbox
products.feature-2-item-4-subitem-2: Interactive dashboard to visualize and execute actions on your records
products.feature-2-item-4-subitem-3: Custom alerts depending on selected criteria
products.feature-2-item-4-subitem-4: Data recovery file download, automatic backups and version history information
products.feature-description-3: Upload your income and expenses, and access real-time financial reports. Manage attendance, payroll, permissions and much more.
products.feature-3-item-1-subitem-1: Operations view in calendar, general and custom dashboard with charts and trends on your income and expenses
products.feature-3-item-1-subitem-2: Budget and expense category management, including payroll with detailed information such as hours worked, deductions and benefits
products.feature-3-item-1-subitem-3: Automated financial reports and optimization suggestions with action plans
products.feature-3-item-1-subitem-4: Manage different independent accounts, currencies and categories
products.feature-3-item-2-subitem-1: Integrated payroll management with attendance insertion and hours worked
products.feature-3-item-2-subitem-2: Role and permission assignment for all areas
products.feature-3-item-2-subitem-3: Private activity in personal areas and real-time activity log for collaboration areas
products.feature-3-item-2-subitem-4: Performance evaluations, goal tracking and talent management
products.feature-3-item-3-subitem-1: Comprehensive lead and prospect management, from prospecting to closing
products.feature-3-item-3-subitem-2: Visual sales funnel with customizable stages and conversion tracking
products.feature-3-item-3-subitem-3: Email and CRM integration to centralize customer interactions
products.feature-3-item-3-subitem-4: Commercial performance reports with conversion metrics, forecast and opportunity analysis
products.feature-3-item-4-subitem-1: Inventory control, logistics, deliveries and returns with stock alerts and resource traceability
products.feature-3-item-4-subitem-2: Internal and external blog for notifications, updates and communication between teams
products.feature-3-item-4-subitem-3: Continuous integration of third-party tools to improve collaboration, productivity and comfort
products.feature-3-item-4-subitem-4: Workflow automation with reminders, approvals and process tracking

customer-success.subtitle:
Real success stories that demonstrate the impact of Gestionate
 on teams like yours.
customer-success.quote-1: We bet on Gestionate and won big: by centralizing the internal communication of the team, our daily and accounting activity on the platform, we no longer need to resort to multiple tools and we reduced organizational time by 60%.
customer-success.quote-2: Gestionate transformed our workflow: now we have all student and teacher records uploaded to the cloud (and editing them couldn't be easier).
customer-success.quote-3: I never thought project management could be so simple. In one place I can see everything I need: the progress of each task, the status of each sale, communication between teams and accounting movements. We are more efficient than ever.

privacy.description: We are committed to protecting your privacy and being transparent about how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
privacy.card-1-description-1: At Gestionate, we understand that your privacy is fundamental to your trust in our services. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our platform and services.
privacy.card-1-description-2: We are committed to being transparent about our data practices and giving you control over your personal information. If you have any questions about this policy, please contact us at privacy@gestionate.com.
privacy.card-2-description: We collect information to provide better services to all our users. The types of information we collect include:
privacy.card-2-list-1-3: Content you create, upload, or share through our services
privacy.card-2-list-1-5: Payment and billing information (processed by secure third-party providers)
privacy.card-2-list-2-1: Usage data and analytics (features used, time spent, interactions)
privacy.card-2-list-2-2: Device information (IP address, browser type, operating system)
privacy.card-2-list-2-3: Cookies and similar tracking technologies (see our Cookie Policy for more details)
privacy.card-2-list-2-4: Log files and technical data for service improvement
privacy.card-3-description: We use the information we collect to:
privacy.card-3-list-1: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
privacy.card-3-list-2: Process transactions and send related information
privacy.card-3-list-3: Send you technical notices, updates, and support messages
privacy.card-3-list-4: Respond to your comments, questions, and customer service requests
privacy.card-3-list-5: Monitor and analyze trends, usage, and activities
privacy.card-3-list-6: Personalize your experience and provide relevant content
privacy.card-3-list-7: Detect, investigate, and prevent fraudulent transactions and security issues
privacy.card-3-list-8: Comply with legal obligations and protect our rights
privacy.card-4-description: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:
privacy.card-4-list-1: With your consent: We will share information when you explicitly agree
privacy.card-4-list-2: Service providers: Trusted third parties who help us operate our services
privacy.card-4-list-3: Legal requirements: When required by law, regulation, or legal process
privacy.card-4-list-4: Business transfers: In connection with mergers, acquisitions, or asset sales
privacy.card-4-list-5: Protection of rights: To protect our rights, privacy, safety, or property
privacy.card-5-description: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
privacy.card-5-list-1: Encryption of data in transit and at rest
privacy.card-5-list-4: Secure data centers with physical security measures
privacy.card-5-list-5: Employee training on privacy and security practices
privacy.card-6-list-1: Access: Request a copy of the personal information we hold about you
privacy.card-6-list-2: Rectification: Ask us to correct any inaccurate or incomplete information
privacy.card-6-list-3: Erasure: Request deletion of your personal information under certain circumstances
privacy.card-6-list-4: Portability: Receive your data in a structured, machine-readable format
privacy.card-6-list-5: Restriction: Ask us to limit how we use your information
privacy.card-6-list-6: Objection: Object to our use of your information for certain purposes
privacy.card-6-list-7: Withdraw consent: Where we rely on consent, you can withdraw it at any time
privacy.card-7-description: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience, analyze usage patterns, and provide personalized content. You can control cookies through your browser settings. However, disabling certain cookies may affect the functionality of our services.
privacy.card-7-list-1: Essential cookies: Required for basic functionality of the site
privacy.card-7-list-2: Preference cookies: Remember your preferences and settings
privacy.card-7-list-3: Performance cookies: Help us understand how you use our services
privacy.card-7-list-4: Analytics cookies: Provide insights for service improvement
privacy.questions-description: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at privacy@gestionate.com.
privacy.questions-info: We typically respond to privacy inquiries within 48 hours.

terms.description: Please read these terms carefully before using our service
terms.card-1-description-1: These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of Gestionate's services, including our website, applications, and any related services (collectively, the "Service") operated by Gestionate ("us", "we", or "our").
terms.card-1-description-2: By accessing or using our Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of these terms, then you may not access the Service.
terms.card-2-list-1: Account Creation: You must provide accurate and complete information when creating an account. You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account.
terms.card-2-list-2: Eligibility: You must be at least 18 years old to use our Service. By using our Service, you represent that you meet this age requirement.
terms.card-2-list-3: Account Responsibility: You are responsible for all activities that occur under your account and for maintaining the confidentiality of your password.
terms.card-3-description: You may not use our Service:
terms.card-3-list-1: For any unlawful purpose or to solicit others to perform unlawful acts
terms.card-3-list-2: To violate any international, federal, provincial, or state regulations, rules, laws, or local ordinances
terms.card-3-list-3: To infringe upon or violate our intellectual property rights or the intellectual property rights of others
terms.card-3-list-4: To harass, abuse, insult, harm, defame, slander, disparage, intimidate, or discriminate
terms.card-3-list-5: To submit false or misleading information
terms.card-3-list-6: To upload or transmit viruses or any other type of malicious code
terms.card-4-list-1: Uptime: We strive to maintain 99.9% uptime for our Service, but we cannot guarantee uninterrupted access.
terms.card-4-list-2: Maintenance: We may temporarily suspend the Service for maintenance, updates, or improvements. We will provide advance notice when possible.
terms.card-4-list-3: Data Backup: While we maintain backups of your data, you are responsible for maintaining your own backups of important information.
terms.card-5-list-1: Subscription Fees: Paid plans are billed in advance on a monthly or annual basis and are non-refundable except as required by law.
terms.card-5-list-2: Free Trial: We may offer a free trial period. At the end of the trial, you will be charged the applicable subscription fee unless you cancel.
terms.card-5-list-3: Price Changes: We reserve the right to modify our pricing with 30 days advance notice to existing subscribers.
terms.card-6-list-1: Your privacy is important to us. Our Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our Service.
terms.card-6-list-2: Data Ownership: You retain all rights to your data. We do not claim ownership of any content you upload or create using our Service.
terms.card-6-list-3: Data Security: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data, including encryption and secure data centers.
terms.card-7-list-1: By You: You may terminate your account at any time by contacting our support team or using the account cancellation feature.
terms.card-7-list-2: By Us: We may terminate or suspend your account if you violate these Terms or engage in conduct that we deem harmful to our Service or other users.
terms.card-7-list-3: Effect of Termination: Upon termination, your right to use the Service will cease immediately. Your data will be deleted within 30 days unless required to be retained by law.
terms.card-8-description: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Gestionate shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses.
terms.questions-description: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us.
terms.questions-info: We typically respond to legal inquiries within 48 hours.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Have questions? Need support? Want to learn more about Gestionate? We would love to hear from you.
contact.form-message-placeholder: Tell us more about your inquiry...
contact.form-response-info: We typically respond within 24 hours during business days.
contact.faq-description: Check out our FAQ section for instant answers to common questions.
contact.form-email-invalid: Please enter a valid email address
contact.success-description: Thank you for contacting us. We've received your message and will get back to you within 24 hours.

getting-started.step-2-item-1: GitHub: Sign in with your existing account
getting-started.step-2-item-3: Demo: Try without registration for 15 days
getting-started.step-3-item-1: Send email invitations from the Team section
getting-started.step-4-item-3: Add personal notes to your home
getting-started.hero-description: From your first registration to advanced features. Learn how to maximize your team's productivity with our step-by-step guide.
getting-started.first-steps-description: Follow these simple steps to set up Gestionate and start working more efficiently in a matter of minutes.
getting-started.next-steps-description: Choose your next step based on your experience level and specific needs.
getting-started.key-features-description: Discover the specific tools that will make your team work more efficiently and organized.
getting-started.feature-1-description: Invite collaborators, assign specific roles and permissions. Organize your team by departments and projects.
getting-started.feature-1-item-1: Email invitations from the Team section
getting-started.feature-2-description: Create organized workspaces by projects. Keep everything related in one place.
getting-started.feature-2-item-1: Dedicated spaces per project or client
getting-started.feature-3-description: Create and manage custom data tables. Store client information, inventory, and more.
getting-started.feature-4-description: Customize your home page with notes, widgets, shortcuts and tools you use frequently.
getting-started.feature-5-description: Control income and expenses, generate financial reports and maintain control of your cash flow.
getting-started.feature-6-description: Keep your team connected with integrated communication tools and smart notifications.

about.description: We're building the future of team collaboration and productivity management, one integrated solution at a time.
about.our-story-p1: Founded in 2024, Gestionate emerged from a simple observation: teams were juggling too many platforms to get work done. From project management to billing, from inventory to team communication - the fragmentation was slowing everyone down.
about.our-story-p2: We set out to build something different. A unified platform that brings all the essential tools together without compromising on functionality or user experience.
about.value-1-description: We design for humans, not just users. Every feature considers the real people behind the screen.
about.value-2-description: We eliminate distractions and complexity, helping teams focus on what truly matters.
about.value-3-description: We constantly evolve, bringing fresh ideas and cutting-edge solutions to everyday problems.
about.value-4-description: We care deeply about our users' success and build relationships that go beyond software.
about.mission-description: We believe every team, regardless of size or budget, deserves access to powerful, integrated tools that help them achieve their goals efficiently and effectively.
about.meet-team-description: We are a diverse group of dreamers, builders, and problem-solvers united by our passion for creating tools that make work more enjoyable.

overview.title: Workspaces
overview.description-title: Workspaces are the core of your organization on our platform. They are dedicated work spaces where you can manage projects, tasks and collaborate with your team efficiently.
overview.subtitle: What is a Workspace?
overview.description-subtitle: A workspace is an organizational container that groups all elements related to a specific project or work area. Each workspace maintains its own tasks, members, settings and permissions completely independently.
overview.section-1-description: View your tasks in table format, kanban board or calendar according to your preferences and current needs.
overview.section-2-description: Invite members, assign tasks and collaborate with your team in real time with instant updates.
overview.section-3-description: Organize tasks with drag & drop, customizable states and visual tracking of project progress.
overview.section-4-description: Set deadlines, visualize schedules and maintain temporal tracking of all your projects.

creation.title: Create a Workspace
creation.description-title: Creating a new workspace is the first step to organizing your work. The process is simple and will allow you to start managing your projects immediately.
creation.subtitle: Creation Process
creation.description-subtitle: The system will guide you through a simple form where you only need to provide a name for your workspace. Once created, you will be automatically redirected to the new workspace dashboard.
creation.section-1-description: From your main dashboard, click the "New Workspace" button or navigate directly to the creation URL.
creation.section-2-description: Enter a descriptive name for your workspace. This name will be visible to all members you invite later.
creation.section-3-description: Click "Create" and you will be automatically redirected to your new workspace dashboard, ready to start working.

dashboard.title: Main Dashboard
dashboard.description-title: The dashboard is the control center of your workspace, where you can access all functionalities and have a complete view of your project.
dashboard.subtitle: Dashboard Components
dashboard.description-subtitle: The dashboard integrates the workspace selector, filtering tools, and the TaskSwitcher that allows you to alternate between different views of your tasks and projects.
dashboard.section-1-description: At the top you will find the workspace selector, which shows the current workspace and allows you to switch between different workspaces if you have access to multiple.
dashboard.section-1-subtitle-description: The selector shows the first letter of the workspace name as an icon and allows quick navigation between projects.
dashboard.section-2-description: The TaskSwitcher is the main component that integrates all task views. It includes tabs to switch between table, kanban and calendar view, as well as tools to create new tasks.
dashboard.section-2-subtitle-1-description: Switch between Table, Kanban and Calendar with a single click, keeping your active filters.
dashboard.section-2-subtitle-2-description: Create tasks quickly from any view with an integrated creation modal.

views.title: Task Views
views.description-title: Your workspace offers three different views to manage your tasks, each optimized for different work styles and specific needs.
views.table-description: Perfect for a detailed and structured view of all your tasks with sorting and search capabilities.
views.kanban-description: Workflow visualization with columns by state, ideal for agile methodologies and visual management.
views.calendar-description: Temporal planning with deadline visualization and task distribution over time.
views.drag-drop-description: When you drag a task, the system automatically calculates new positions, updates the state if you change columns, and synchronizes changes with the server through the useBulkUpdateTasks hook to maintain real-time consistency.

overview.title: Billing Management
overview.description-title: Manage all your income and expenses from a unified portal with real-time visualizations and automatic reports for complete financial control.
overview.subtitle: Complete Operational Portal
overview.description-subtitle: Visualize your financial situation with real-time charts, automatic transaction categorization and multiple analysis views to make informed decisions.
overview.section-1-description: Record income and expenses with automatic categorization and detailed tracking of each financial transaction.
overview.section-2-description: Visualize your financial situation with interactive charts, key metrics and real-time trends.
overview.details-description: Complete table of all financial operations
overview.calendar-description: Monthly view of transactions by date

operations.title: Operations Management
operations.description-title: Record and manage all your financial transactions with intuitive tools and automatic categorization.
operations.subtitle: Transaction Registry
operations.description-subtitle: Each operation is recorded with complete information: amount, description, category, date, and payment method for detailed tracking.
operations.section-1-description-1: Record all your income sources with automatic categorization and pattern tracking.
operations.section-1-description-2: Control all your operational and personal expenses with customizable categories.
operations.section-2-description: The system learns from your spending patterns and automatically suggests categories for new transactions, saving you time and maintaining consistency.

analytics.title: Analytics and Reports
analytics.description-title: Get deep insights into your financial situation with advanced analytics and customizable reports.
analytics.subtitle: Analytics Dashboard
analytics.description-subtitle: Visualize key metrics, trends and spending patterns with interactive charts and real-time reports to make informed decisions.
analytics.section-1-description-1: Tracking of all income by period
analytics.section-1-description-2: Control of all expenses and categories
analytics.section-2-description-1: Generate automatic reports by day, week, month, quarter or year with comparisons to previous periods.
analytics.section-2-description-2: Detailed breakdown of expenses and income by categories with percentages and growth trends.

overview.title: Team Management
overview.description-title: Control who can access what information with a granular role system. Invite members, assign specific permissions and maintain the security of your organization.
overview.subtitle: Role and Permission System
overview.description-subtitle: Manage your team with automatic email invitations, customizable roles and granular permission control for each platform functionality.
overview.section-1-description: Email invitation system with unique codes and automated onboarding process.
overview.section-2-description: Define exactly what each member can do with granular permissions by functionality.
overview.section-3-description: Complete record of all actions performed by each team member.
overview.section-4-description: Create specific roles for your organization with unique permission combinations.
overview.role-1-description: Full control of the organization, user management, settings and access to all functionalities.
overview.role-2-description: Team and project management, task assignment, report viewing and general supervision.
overview.role-3-description: Create and edit content, manage records, participate in workspaces and collaborate actively.
overview.role-4-description: Read-only access to information, dashboard viewing and limited access to basic functionalities.

invitations.title: Invitation Management
invitations.description-title: Invite new members to your organization with an automated system of unique codes and integrated onboarding process.
invitations.subtitle: Invitation Code System
invitations.description-subtitle: Each workspace generates unique invitation codes that allow new members to join automatically with predefined permissions.
invitations.section-1-description: From the workspace settings, generate a unique invitation code with the assigned role you want.
invitations.section-2-description: Share the invitation code by email, message or any communication channel with the person you want to invite.
invitations.section-3-description: The new member accesses with the code, registers automatically and gets immediate access with the assigned permissions.
invitations.modify-roles-description: Change the roles of existing members at any time according to project needs.
invitations.revoke-access-description: Remove members from the workspace when necessary, immediately revoking all their permissions.

permissions.title: Permission Control
permissions.description-title: Define exactly what each team member can do with a granular permission system by functionality.
permissions.subtitle: Layered Security
permissions.description-subtitle: The system implements multiple security layers: permissions by workspace, by functionality and by content type for maximum protection.
permissions.best-practice-1: Assign the minimum level of permissions needed for each role
permissions.best-practice-2: Periodically review permissions of active users
permissions.best-practice-3: Use predefined roles before creating custom roles
permissions.best-practice-4: Keep a record of important permission changes

overview.title: Records
overview.description: Records allow you to create and manage custom tables to store any type of structured information you need for your business.
overview.dynamic-tables-description: Create completely customizable tables for customers, suppliers, products, leads, inventory, or any data you need to organize. Each table can have unique fields according to your specific needs.
overview.import-description: Import existing data from Excel, CSV files, or migrate from other platforms quickly and easily.
overview.custom-fields-description: Define the fields you need: text, numbers, dates, multiple options, file attachments and more.
overview.advanced-filters-description: Filter and sort data with multiple criteria to find exactly what you need.
overview.smart-search-description: Search across all fields in your tables with instant search and automatic suggestions.
overview.change-history-description: Keep a complete record of all changes made to your data with timestamps and users.
overview.flexible-export-description: Export your data in multiple formats: Excel, CSV, PDF, or use our API for integrations.

creation.title: Create Records Tables
creation.description: Creating a new records table is simple and flexible. Define exactly the fields you need for your specific use case.
creation.creation-process-description: The system allows you to create completely customized tables with the fields you need. You can start from scratch or use predefined templates for common cases.
creation.step-1-description: Assign a descriptive name to your table and define what type of information you will store (customers, products, leads, etc.).
creation.step-2-description: Define the necessary fields: name, email, phone, address, etc. Each field can be of different types according to your needs.
creation.step-3-description: Start adding data manually or import existing information from Excel/CSV files.

management.title: Records Management
management.description: Once your tables are created, you have complete tools to manage, organize and analyze all your information efficiently.
management.management-interface-description: The records interface is designed to be intuitive and powerful, with inline editing tools, dynamic filters and customizable views.
management.inline-editing-description: Modify any field directly from the table view without needing separate forms. Changes are saved automatically.
management.inline-editing-tip: Use Tab to navigate between fields and Enter to confirm changes quickly.
management.custom-views-description: Create different views of the same table with filters, sorting and specific columns for different purposes.
management.batch-operations-description: Perform operations on multiple records simultaneously: edit, delete, export or apply bulk changes.

landing.integrated-apps-description: Connect the tools you'll use to automate processes and maximize your team's productivity.
landing.available-integrations-description: Log in once and enjoy the convenience of having everything you need in one place.
landing.integration-1: Create meetings easily with your team members
landing.integration-2: View your created events and meetings
landing.integration-3: Listen to your music with Spotify in the background
landing.integration-4: Manage your GitHub repositories from the platform
landing.our-integrations: The integrations that will make your work more productive and easier
landing.our-integrations-description:
Connect the more than 10 applications we have available
 to optimize your workday.
landing.button-get-demo-1: Get a free demo without registration
landing.demo-info-description-1: You are about to create a free demo account to explore the platform. You don't need to enter your name, email, or any personal information: everything is generated automatically.
landing.demo-info-description-2: The account and all associated information will be available for a maximum of 15 days.
landing.demo-info-description-3: After that time, the data is automatically deleted, and no records you have created will remain in our database. Data cleansing is generated automatically, and if you create your account near the end of that cycle, the trial period may be shorter.
landing.demo-info-description-4: You can invite users to join your team during this period.
landing.demo-info-description-5: They will also use temporary accounts and can explore the application and all available features. Both the team and your guests' accounts, along with all their data, will be deleted after the demo cycle.
landing.demo-info-description-6: The account is generic and without any custom configuration.
landing.demo-info-description-7: The email, username, and organization name correspond to a demo account. They are merely illustrative. The account is created with the Free plan by default.
landing.demo-info-description-8: Fast and secure, with no commitments or registration required.
landing.demo-info-description-9: Start exploring Gestionate and discover its full potential.
landing.navbar-gestionate: The web application that allows you to manage your business more efficiently. Everything you need, in one place.
landing.navbar-intro-description: What Gestionate is about and how it can help you in your work.
landing.navbar-how-it-works-description: Everything you need to know to start using Gestionate.
landing.navbar-now-what-description: Gestionate is customizable. See everything you can do.
landing.navbar-products-all-description: Get a comprehensive overview of all our available products.
landing.navbar-products-workspaces-description: We offer Workspace Gestion to manage your team's tasks
landing.navbar-products-billing-description: Bill Gestion will allow you to upload your financial transactions and generate a summary
landing.navbar-products-records-description: Upload all the records you need and organize them into tables
landing.navbar-products-inventory-description: Upload inflows and outflows and efficiently control your stock
landing.footer-cta-description: Discover how far you can go. Whether you're scaling your own project or want to increase your company's productivity and forget about multiple work-syncing platforms, we have the ideal solution for you.
landing.docs-intro-description: is here to make your work as simple as possible, unifying everything you need in one place to have real control over your tasks and those of your entire team, to know how other departments are progressing, and to keep all your records easily accessible, editable, and uploaded. We want to expand your workspace into opportunities without having to use dozens of applications or systems.
landing.docs-how-it-works-description: Your organization will have all our features. Just choose a plan and start working. You'll be able to allow and deny access to the users you add to your organization, and you can modify permissions whenever you want. Each action has a history, so everything done in the app will be recorded. Explore all the conveniences and opportunities our products offer.
landing.docs-now-what-description-2: we want to make your workday as pleasant as possible. That means, in addition to all the features we provide, you can personalize it, giving it that personal touch that makes you feel comfortable in your daily life. The Home section is yours; use all the shortcuts and widgets available. You can also add your notes, those you only share with yourself as reminders. And you can also change fonts and colors. Apply your style!
landing.products-title: See everything we can offer you
landing.products-workspaces-description: G-Workspace provides a system for keeping track of your team's activities. Create your tasks and manage them with a Kanban board, and also view them in tables or with a calendar view.
landing.products-billing-description: G-Billing allows you to upload your income and expenses to clearly and directly view your account summary. Add the charts that best suit your management system.
landing.products-records-description: Upload your records of clients, potential clients, suppliers, affiliates, or any list you want and need. You can upload your Excel file for multiple records and you can also upload them manually. Different tables are available to you.
landing.products-inventory-description: With G-Inventory, you'll efficiently control your inventory. Easily enter inputs and outputs, and manage your stock. We provide you with multiple easy-to-use tools. You'll see that keeping track of inventory has never been so simple.
landing.products-description:
Discover our suite of tools designed to boost productivity,
 optimize processes, and help your organization grow.
landing.product-workspace-item-1: Kanban board, calendar and task list
landing.product-workspace-item-3: Download reports in PDF and Excel
landing.products-overview-title: The solutions Gestionate has for you in these products
landing.products-overview-description:
Integrated tools that cover all the needs of your organization,
 from project management to financial analysis.
landing.products-tech-description: Gestionate guarantees security, performance, and scalability with advanced features designed for organizations seeking operational excellence and sustainable growth.
landing.products-diff-description-1: Intuitive actions, smooth navigation, and a friendly, customizable interface that makes adoption easy for any user.
landing.products-diff-description-2: Integrated machine learning for predictions, task automation, and personalized recommendations.
landing.products-diff-description-3: AES-256 encryption and multi-factor authentication. Your data is protected with the highest industry standards.
landing.faq-description: Even more curious about how Gestionate works? You might find the answer here
landing.faq-answer-1: No, Gestionate is a tool designed for any type of organization, whether it's a business, an educational institution, or even freelancers
landing.faq-question-2: Do all plans include all features?
landing.faq-answer-2: Yes. You'll be able to manage different volumes of data, members, workspaces, etc., but you'll have all our products available
landing.faq-question-3: How does the 'free demo without registration' work?
landing.faq-answer-3: We give you limited-time access to our entire application with a basic plan, so you can see 'from the inside' how it looks and works. Everything you do will only remain up to a maximum of 15 days. After this period, all your activity will be deleted, from your account to the documents you created.
landing.faq-question-4: Can I change my plan at any time?
landing.faq-answer-4: Yes, that's right. You always have the option to upgrade or downgrade your plan. We also won't charge any additional fees if you make the change during the month.
landing.faq-answer-5: Of course, we are here to help you with any inconvenience or difficulty you may encounter. Our contact channels are open every day at your disposal.
landing.faq-question-6: How can I cancel my subscription?
landing.faq-answer-6: It only takes one click. You are free to cancel your subscription at any time. It would be a sad situation for us, so we'll ask you about your reasons for closing your account. This is a mini-survey that will help us understand you more clearly and improve in the future.
landing.who-we-are-description: Meet the team behind the engine. Heres a quick look at our mission and what drives us to deliver the best service.
landing.who-we-are-1: is the ideal tool to manage all your work. The idea was born from the need to unify all the systems we use in our daily routines.
landing.who-we-are-3: you have full control over your entire workflow, and we're still developing even more tools for you. Our mission is to ensure that everything we can manage for you, you do it here, with us.
landing.who-we-are-4: We'll provide you with every possible comfort to make your workday easier. We wont stop working for you.

workspaces.confirm-delete-message: This action is irreversible. All tasks, projects and associated configurations will be deleted.

workspaces.workflow-description: Configure how tasks are managed in your workspace
workspaces.auto-archive-completed-description: Tasks marked as completed will be archived after 30 days
workspaces.show-card-count-description: Controls when to display the number of cards in each column
workspaces.column-limits-description: Set maximum task limits allowed in each column

workspaces.other-fields-always-required: Name, status, and priority fields will always be required
workspaces.compact-cards-description: Hide issue type, due date, and assigned members on Kanban board cards
workspaces.auto-assign-on-create-description: Automatically assign the creator as responsible for the task

workspaces.date-format-description: How due dates will be displayed on cards
workspaces.notifications-description: Configure when and how automatic notifications are sent to workspace members

workspaces.notify-due-date-reminder-description: Send automatic reminder before tasks are due
workspaces.notify-task-no-movement-description: Send notification if a task has no updates for 7 days
workspaces.notify-member-no-tasks-description: Send notification when a member has no assigned tasks

workspaces.delete-workspace-description: Permanently delete this workspace and all its content
workspaces.column-limit-reached-description: You cannot move more tasks to this column. The maximum limit is {limit}. You can modify it in settings.
